text: Hala railway station (, Sindhi: هالا ريلوي اسٽيشن) is located in Hala City, District Matiari, Sindh, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways * Hala City * Taluka Hala ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Matiari District
title: Hala (Pakistan) railway station
